DOC.brief_title: Snacking , Satiety & Weight : A Randomized , Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Snacking implicate obesity epidemic , judicious snack help control appetite calorie intake add nutrient-dense food diet . The investigator hypothesize snack nutrient-dense , highly satiate snack food ( i.e . KIND snacks almond ) compare snack nutrient-dilute , energy-dense food ( i.e. , conventional snack food ) contribute satiety , weight loss , health improvement . The investigator hypothesize benefit healthful snack enhanced portion clearly define controlled packaging . Finally , investigator hypothesize effect see even study participant give clear guidance calorie content snack item , make room calorie diet . Hypotheses : 1 . Snacking nutrient-dense , highly satiate snack food ( i.e . KIND snacks almond ) compare snack nutrient-dilute , energy-dense food ( i.e. , conventional snack food ) contribute satiety , weight loss , health improvement . 2 . The benefit healthful snack enhanced portion size clearly define controlled packaging . 3 . These effect see even study participant give clear guidance calorie content snack item , make room calorie diet .
DOC.criteria: Man woman age 2575 year ; Nonsmoker ; Sedentary ; Overweight ( BMI ≥25kg/m² ) waist circumference > 40 inch ( 102 cm ) men > 35 inch ( 88 cm ) woman ; Interested lose weight , actively involved diet weight loss program . Snack regularly prepackaged snack typically available grocery store vend machine . Willing consume snack daily basis . Failure meet inclusion criterion ; Anticipated inability complete study protocol reason ; Current eat disorder ; Diabetes ; Sleep apnea ; Actively involve diet weight loss program ; Other restricted diet due allergy/intolerance ( i.e . nut , gluten ) choice ( i.e. , vegetarian , vegan ) ; Regular exercise define participate moderateintensity least 150 minutes/week .
